Description.Name: Improved Automation
Description.Details: â€¢ Allows Repair Bay 3 in Mech Bay 3 to repair at 100% efficiency. Repairs to the Mech Bay have unearthed a much more extensive system of 'Mech maintenance automation than Yang previously suspected. Once it's back online, many common tasks will become trivial.

AssignedCastDescription: There are even more machines hidden in the walls and under the floor panels! Once I get it figured out, and you get me the specialized parts I need, we'll be turning out Mechs in record time.
